entry.title: Dead Ends and New Beginnings
entry.summary:
Author: Buttercupcheese

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,059Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 62

Summary: Stiles groaned and slowly got up. Isaac had fallen asleep somewhere between Peter’s rant about trolls' healing properties and Derek's hypothesis of witches, which — for the first time— well, not first, but Stiles wanted to exaggerate — Stiles thought the same.“Look, I'm running on just, like, three full hours of sleep. I haven't had a single drop of caffeine in my system, and my waffles are getting cold,” he said, heading to reheat his coffee.“You shouldn't drink caffeine, Stiles,” his dad said, concern and disapproval firmly set on his features.“And there shouldn’t be walking corpses out there, Dad, but hey—life’s unfair.”

entry.title: The Scent of Love (Original)
entry.summary:
Author: Zero_Nemad

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,975Chapters: 11/16Kudos: 38

Summary: Sheriff Stilinski decides to sent Stiles on a months long overseas trip. Because his son definitely needs a vacation and a little time out from Beacon Hills.Thanks to Derek, who lives in Venice, Italy, he also has a place to stay.Reluctantly, Stiles agrees to fly to Europe and encounters a somewhat changed Derek Hale.As they share an apartment, they begin to redefine their uneasy friendship and learn to trust each other.With lots of fun and flirty banter, both guys eventually get to know a whole new world of heartbreak, sex and true connection.(note to previous readers: I've changed and added a lot of dialogues, rewrite the sex scenes and the ending of the story will be different than in the first version from 2022/23.)

entry.title: Moonlight Sonata
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,130Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 27

Summary: The cold of the night keeps its secrets, guarding eyes that have never aged, hands that have caressed the impossible.Stiles drifts through cities and shadows, carrying the weight of centuries, solitude etched into his bones, pacts whispered to forces no one dares name.When the Hale pack confronts enemies that twist the very laws they know, his power stirs — offering sanctuary and danger in equal, haunting measure.Amid fractured promises, spilled blood, and the hum of ancient magic, something rises — too fierce to be safe, too wild to be tamed, something that bends rules, time, and the fragile thread of sanity itself.On the razor’s edge between survival and oblivion, they will learn that some forces cannot be commanded… and some desires cannot, will not, be denied.

entry.title: The Recipe for Life
entry.summary:
Author: PeterChristensen

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 79,787Chapters: 12/12Kudos: 75

Summary: Stiles is the engine that runs Doughboy, the chaotic little bakery he built from his late mother’s treasured recipes, but the stress of keeping her memory alive, 16-hour days, 6 days a week, has started to take its toll. To make matters worse, when the town's Chamber of Commerce pressures him into a cooking competition for their latest viral marketing stunt, he’s partnered with the last person he’d ever choose. Derek Hale, the world-traveled trust-fund baby and brooding Gordan Ramsey wannabe.Derek, a professional chef who's still struggling with the recent passing of his sister, is the last living Hale to uphold a world-class culinary legacy. While returning to Beacon Hills, his childhood hometown, he opens his flagship restaurant, Hales, as an honor to the memory of his late family. But now he's stuck with Stiles Stilinski, the hot mess from the Doughboy bakery, who's stuck in the past and refuses to join the present, as a partner in a viral cooking competition that could make or break his new restaurant's success.Sparks fly as flour meets foie gras, and their rivalry in the culinary scene threatens to ignite into something far messier, and far more irresistible, than either expected.

entry.title: Chaos Come Again
entry.summary:
Author: SierraStyx

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 78,398Chapters: 28/?Kudos: 961

Summary: Stiles has a good life. He has a great job, a great husband, and he's happy in Virginia. The pack is doing fine under Scott's leadership back in California. Aside from the grisly murder scenes he sees on cases, Stiles' life is actually pretty perfect. Which is of course, when everything goes wrong.Basically Stiles is part of the BAU team, and the Nogitsune returns. Mind games ensue. There are not nearly enough crossovers where Stiles is on the team, so idk here you go, brought to you by the voices in my head. Also in this fic Stiles and Derek didn't get together until Stiles was well into college, because I think canon-era Stiles/Derek is really creepy.

entry.title: Fatal
entry.summary:
Author: arthurvittal

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 82,240Chapters: 5/5Kudos: 8

Summary: His blue eyes were beautiful. Honestly, the most beautiful Stiles had ever seen. He ran his eyes over his body, certain that they were also deadly.He felt unable to move, his feet no longer obeying him. He was staring at Stiles, seeming to wonder why he was still there, standing, admiring him. As much as Stiles wanted to, he would never run away from him. He wanted answers to his questions, and he felt he could get them right then and there.Running away might be impossible. Screaming might bring him a quicker death. Staying, perhaps, for the slightest chance, an attempt to understand who Derek Hale was.Perhaps.

entry.title: The Creator's Game
entry.summary:
Author: Glitter_Lips

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 111,808Chapters: 32/37Kudos: 39

Summary: Everyone in my story is dead. Alec has been a Beacon Hills resident and a McCall pack member for just over a year, and he’s finally starting to feel comfortable and safe after his near death experience at the hands of Monroe and her hunter army. He doesn’t want to get involved in the war ever again, content to play lacrosse and live his life.But Monroe isn’t finished yet, and she won’t rest until all supernatural people are wiped out for good. Her plans won’t allow Alec to stay uninvolved forever, and his past threatens to catch up with him no matter how badly he had hoped to keep those secrets buried.

entry.title: begin your journey and do not skip ahead
entry.summary:
Author: spoilerfreak

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,492Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 78

Summary: The first page greets him with a polaroid: Stiles, disheveled and grinning tiredly, perched on his suitcase in the living room. Beside it in marker block letters: BEGIN YOUR JOURNEY. DO NOT SKIP AHEAD. Derek scowls at the page, tempted to flip straight to the back. But in the corner in tiny letters: Yes, you can turn the page today. With a huff, he does. The next page has the present date and a short message: Here we are on the first day of me gone. I am on my way to get properly educated and you are on your way to find a treasure chest. Wipe that frown off your face, Sourwolf. We are both beginning an adventure, so put on something comfortable and pack a change of underwear. There’s an actual treasure map taped to the page. --- What if Stiles leaves for college and Derek decides to stay in Beacon Hills. What if Stiles leaves Derek with a journal entry for every day. An instruction manual. What if Derek follows it and rebuilds his life, page by page.

entry.title: Bluff
entry.summary:
Author: verydemure

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,766Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 135

Summary: Derek is desperate, his family on the brink of ruin. Ordered by the Council to marry before the end of the year, everyone assumes he'll just marry some rich woman and get to creating an heir.They're wrong.-Mischief.Derek thinks that's what Stiles' full Polish name means. It's all he sees as Stiles says, “You know. I think I was wrong on both accounts." Before Derek can respond, Stiles continues, “Will you ask again? Properly.” Stiles glances to the side of the table. To the floor.It's a test.Derek takes his dead mother's ring. Gets down on one knee in front of Stiles, who generously makes room between his legs.“Will you marry me?”“Yes.”

entry.title: Survivors
entry.summary:
Author: Nenufarluz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 40,115Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 56

Summary: The world fell into ruin in just a few days, overtaken by a virus that turned ordinary people into ravenous undead. Amid the chaos, Stiles, a college student in New York, is forced to leave the safety of his dorm and try to make his way across the country. His destination: California, where he hopes to find his father and best friend still alive.The journey is brutal. Zombies aren’t the only danger, here’s hunger, cold, loneliness, and the cruelty of other survivors. Along the way, Stiles meets Derek Hale, a gruff and guarded man who is also searching for his family. Together, they form a strong alliance, fighting side by side through the devastation.As the world around them falls apart, the two discover something stronger than fear and loss: the growing connection between them. Amid the pain, the possibility of something unexpected begins to emerge... maybe even love.
